title.rendered: Walter Van Beirendonck. FW 2023/2024 during Paris Fashion Week

content.rendered:
Walter Van Beirendonck. FW 2023/2024 during Paris Fashion Week

Belgium based fashion designer presenting menswear collections since 1983. The collections are inspired by art, music and literature, mixed with ethnic and nature influences. Designs are notable for their strong graphics, innovative cuts and unexpected colour combinations, along with a sense of humour. Collections are to be seen as statements, both playful and serious, regarding fashion, nature, contemporary life and society.


Text and Photo: Walter Van Beirendonck.

More on: www.waltervanbeirendonck.com @waltervanbeirendonckofficial

Thanks: TOTEM FASHION


By Senior Fashion Editor 24FashionTV: Christina V Henningstad @christina_henningstad
